summary: A failed assassination attempt in Harbin, China in 1909 changes the course of history. Now two JBI agents must find the connections between it and an ancient Korean artifact.
cast: Jang Dong-Gun|Tôru Nakamura|Jin-ho Seo|Goo Shin|Ho-jin Chun|Kil-kang Ahn|Rick Burford|Victor Carsrud|Luci Christian|Kaytha Coker|Masaaki Daimon|Marty Fleck|John Gremillion|Jay Hickman|Shôhei Imamura|Nobuyuki Katsube|Gyu-ri Kim|Mike Kleinhenz|Sa-Pi Lee|Svea Macek|Mike MacRae|George Manley|Andy McAvin|Vic Mignogna|Ken Mitsuishi|Rob Mungle|Phil Ross|John Swasey|John Tyson|Kira Vincent-Davis|Sang-Jeon Woo|Miki Yoshimura|Carl Macek
title: 2009 loseuteu maemorijeu
